text: Elias Mahmoudi is a French-Algerian Muay Thai fighter. ==Titles and accomplishments== Amateur * 2014 Siam Fight Junior Champion * 2013 ICO Junior −50kg World Champion * 2013 IFMA Junior −48kg World Champion * France Muay Thai Champion Professional * 2019 WBC Muay Thai International Super Featherweight Champion * 2018 WPMF World −61kg Champion * 2009 Theprasit Stadium Champion ==Muay Thai record== {| class="toccolours" style="width:100%;
